name: Master vs Slave
description: Master vs Slave is a RPG where you get to role-play as a master or as a slave. As a slave, you can choose to be a loyal submissive that lives to please the master, or a defiant rebel that plots revenge and escape. Depending on your choices, the game will have different endings. As a master, you play a more singular route of training your slaves and making money to run your business. It has no ending and is a sandbox-type gameplay.
